name: Blood to Stone
description:
The sun has set for the final time. Your Lord, the King of Darkness, has plunged the world into eternal night. You do not know why - such things are not for you to question. No, you are merely tasked with completing his rituals. You, and all of your identical clones, whose bodies you walk upon to accomplish your tasks. 

Blood to Stone is a puzzle platformer created for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Death is Only the Beginning." Players traverse a series of levels where the player's own lives is their currency: when they die, a platform is spawned in their place. Created by Trish G and Percy R.
